title: How does the new Alistar look guys?

embed.description: Full animated 3D models for LoL champion Alistar, try all of the skins!

body:
Whaddya guys reckon?
I love the new Alistar now :D

replies.body: We all had the chance to get Black Alistar, we just didn't pre-order the physical game years ago.

Whether we had the chance or not 90% of us will miss out on the skin because we didn't know about the game then and the ones who do have it have a 1 in 123 chance of picking Alistar and a 1 in 8 chance of picking black Alistar as his skin, no matter how you look at it, that skin is hardly ever going to be seen.
It's how pre-order bonuses work mate.

Im not disputing that, my point was its sad how we (whether we own it or not) will hardly get to see it and its the best one
if i was RIOT i would have put my effort less into black alistar and more into the other ones so ppl would enjoy my work more and make me more money,
im not complaining that i dont have black alistar I'm complaining that the best skin of all of them we never get to see.

Anyway i have a mac so even if i was around when we could pre-order it wouldn't do me any good

They more than likely put equal amount of effort into each skin, it wouldn't be fair if they put less effort into redesigning Black Alistar, especially to the people who pre-ordered the game and are still around.

You might consider that it looks the best, but that is really your tastes that it applies to.
Skins are a matter of individual taste after all. My favourite Annie skin is Panda Annie, but most people say Reverse Annie is the best skin.

I didn't meant put any less effort into it, i mean put effort into making it so the currently available skins acre more sought after to create a demand and get more money.

I see what you mean and you are probably right, but to me it seems like every time they do a VU the legacy skin gets the best VU e.g. Phantom karthus, Riot singed

they way it seems to me is that before the upgrade no one cared about any of them, and now after the VU Phantom Karthus, Riot singed and Black Ali have gone from the skins no one cared about to the crowd favourite, at least from why i have heard other people say about them.

it seems counter productive to me to have the unavailable skins as the favourites. 

but thats just my two cents :P

I'm with you there i prefer panda to reverse annie.

For me Karthus is all about the Pentakill skin. I've got Phantom but I just don't like it as much.
Pentakill Karthus has additional voice lines that I absolutely love, the look is awesome, it's just my default for him.

It's really got to do with the base theme of a skin to how it ends up coming out when complete.
Black Alistar looks the best to you, simply because it's theme is more attractive to you.
When Kayle eventually gets her VU which is much needed, I'll think Silver Kayle my favourite skin for her looks best.



Time to go a {{champion:15}}  match and struggle to decide on using PAX, Spectacular or Warrior Princess.
I love how each skin has its own different set of horns on alistar.

I think it looks pretty cool honestly. I reckon out of all the skins, Black Alistair looks the 'best/most improved'.
Nonetheless it will be hard to say goodbye obviously, like the old rift map, but it won't be hard to let go, as he looks sweet.
Now we can "milk those" in high definition!
I wonder if a new splash art will be accompanying this VU? {{champion:12}}

It's been some time, I have always had problem with Unchained {{champion:12}} 's face, which it seems to be fixed in the update.

Very cool, same with the other skins.
Same. I've had the Longhorn Alistar skin for ages and it is really awesome how they've changed it to look exactly like his splash art, besides the horns and shoes (which isn't a big deal).

I really don't like it. ><
Very disappointed as an Ali main. To me, the new models lack character.

I just realised what his face looks like: a kobold from Warcraft. You no take candle!
